Remus: What are you eating!?

Remus: Really Pads? Another one?

summary:
Draco: The only reason why I'd date you would be because of the fame
Harry: I'd date you because of the money. And because...
body:
Draco: The only reason why I'd date you would be because of the fame
Harry: I'd date you because of the money. And because you're beautiful
Draco: What?
Harry: What?

tags: this was supposed to be fun
i kind of find it funny
please Don't hate me for that lame fic
title: Happy birthday
body:
If I’m not wrong, I think that today is @ununquadius birthday ! so I wish you a happy birthday, an amazing birthday cake (I migh crave a pic of it) and wished for presents ! Congratulation on being a year older !!! 

As said, here’s a stupid Drarry fic ^^ there’s a lot of incoherence, but don’t focus on them ahah. Hope you’ll have fun reading it! and I’m sorry this isn’t the fluffy fic I’ve said I write… but it’s kinda funny ? ^^’ anyway, HAPPY BIRTHDAY! And have a wonderful day

Kindly, L.

Light footsteps down the stairs had Harry raised his head from the oven. He knew it was Malfoy; it couldn’t be anyone else, not that early in the morning.

“Oh, you’re awake.” The blond boy stated, stopping dead in the middle of the room as he finally saw him.

“I bake an apple-pie.” Harry responded awkwardly, wondering again what he was doing in Malfoy’s flat. “It should be ready in five minutes. If you want some, of course.

-Did you- Have you

-Is Draco Malfoy stuttering? I would have seen everything.” He tried to joke as the other boy was scanning the room, probably looking for the shattered piece of the dishes he broke last night when his past had crawled in his nightmares. Could he just tell him it has all already been cleaned up? Could he just ask him how he was feeling?

“I don’t stutter. I’m just not a morning person.” He declared in his usual pre-war tone. “I’ll set the table. Thank you for cooking.

-My pleasure.”

Harry didn’t really know why, but words burnt his tongue. He who usually didn’t mind silence couldn’t bear the one surrounding them. Maybe it was the cling of plates and cutlery, maybe it was the way Malfoy kept avoiding his gaze. “Isn’t it too hard waking up that early for work, then?” he finally asked.

“Listen Potter, I’m not either a fucking morning person, or a night owl, or whatever Muggles say. I know you know about last night. And Mother’s coming over. And I woke up earlier to tidy things that have already been. So thank you for the cleaning, and the cooking, but please shut your mouth I can’t deal with it right now.

-Oh, okay.

-I’m sorry I’m an arse. You’re nice and everything but…” he briefly shook his head. “Just I’m sorry, okay? I’ll be sweet and sunshine another day.”  As Harry had trouble keeping his face straight, he rolled his eyes. “Come on, say that stupid thing that’s making you laugh…

-Can I?

-Go on.” He waited, a hand on his waist, ready for anything and everything.

“Sweet and sunshine? You?” He croaked seconds before cracking up.

Looking up for his chastisement, Harry didn’t cross any murdering glare. Contrariwise, the white blond boy had a small grin on his lips and an endeared gaze. “I really don’t know what’s wrong with you. But there really is something.”

At least it made you smile Harry said to himself. “Please don’t refrain yourself from insulting me while you eat my delicious pie.

-Dully noted.”

“You don’t have to leave that early, you know? Mother isn’t coming home before eight.

-I have homework to do… for today. So…

-See you around, then.

-Yeah.

-Bye, Potter.

-Bye.

-Are you like waiting for me to leave before Apparating?

-Um, I guess. Yes, I do.

-You really are weirdly wired.

-You already told me.

-Not my fault if you’re super weird.

-Yeah.

-You keep being.

-Sorry.

-Is there something you wanna say? Or…?

-Are you going to be okay?

-Don’t ruin everything.

-I can be weird but not careful?

-Have a nice day, Potter.” He said, opening the front door.

“Malfoy, wait!

-What again?

-Okay I’m weird, and I care too much, and I can’t do anything else but care for you too. I don’t really know why, but I do. And I got it, you don’t want me to, but I will. I won’t say anything to anyone about last night, but if you ever need to talk, I’m here, and I care. Even if you’re still a prat. Mostly cause you’re still a prat.

-Shove off.

-And have a nice day too!” he shouted as the boy in blue rode his bike away from the tiny house.

reblog.comment:
If I’m not wrong, I think that today is @ununquadius birthday ! so I wish you a happy birthday, an amazing birthday cake (I migh crave a pic of it) and wished for presents ! Congratulation on being a year older !!! 

As said, here’s a stupid Drarry fic ^^ there’s a lot of incoherence, but don’t focus on them ahah. Hope you’ll have fun reading it! and I’m sorry this isn’t the fluffy fic I’ve said I write… but it’s kinda funny ? ^^’ anyway, HAPPY BIRTHDAY! And have a wonderful day

Kindly, L.

body: I’ve always wondered about this scene. I know Snape takes this out to pull out his wand but like these are like knives and potion tools if I was Harry and I was watching Snape pull this out I would freak out! Like why do we need knives for occlumency?!
